title: Beth Ditto webchat â as it happened | Music | The Guardian
summary: 'i have plans for a solo record . it 's mostly a lot of harp ; i play the spoons really well '
'i did n't know my last name was a word until the movie ghost came out . patrick swayze is like : `` ditto '' '
'still riding on that standing in the way of control hype '
'i combat [ sexism ] by not taking no for an answer '
'i 've never done auditions i can never just `` turn it on '' '
'ursula from the little mermaid and mama grape from what 's eating gilbert grape ? are my inspirations fashion-wise '
'i prefer `` live fat , die never '' . i 'm pretty sure my weight decides itself '

text: that 's all for today !
thanks to everyone who posted questions and to beth for her time and her hilarious answers .
until next time !
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:24pm thank you for all the questions .
i especially liked the really difficult ones , and the funny ones .
if you need me , i 'll be looking up who won the fa cup for the last fifty or sixty years .
guv111 asks : my question : why ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:23pm why not ?
did you get that ?
snappymuffins asks : hillary or bernie ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:22pm ca n't they just get together and make a perfect combination ?
why must we divide and conquer ?
it 's whoever is getting the most momentum for me , honestly .
i like the idea of bernie , but i do n't know if america is going to go for it .
i liked ralph nader .
i love bernie .
but i just do n't trust the right wing at all - i 'm such a conspiracy theorist , `` the damn right wing are trying to rip us to shreds ! ''
it 's hard to know who to trust .

documents.title: 'i have plans for a solo record . it 's mostly a lot of harp ; i play the spoons really well '
text: johnston asks : would you be interested to return to your earlier sound at any point , now that you have the platform to make it viable ?
i need movement part ii in my bones guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:19pm ah , i would love to do something as raw as that was , it was a fun record to make .
hopefully yes , give me some time .
it 's my favourite gossip record .
because it was so lo-fi , and it was the first time we had ever written songs - before it was a job .
i have plans for a solo record .
it 's mostly a lot of harp ; i play the spoons really well .
and songs like bobby mcferrin 's do n't worry be happy , but sad .
midnightgrowler asks : any plans for menswear ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:18pm i would love to do a menswear line , a basic line that 's good for everybody .
an androgynous line .
i just think that 's it better that everyone can wear it , and i do n't know enough about menswear to do it yet .
sidfishes asks : any tips for dealing with septoria leaf spot ?
it completely wiped out my tomato crop last season .
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:17pm leaf spot !
is it a problem due to it not getting enough sun and it being too damp ?
do they also have bottom rot ?
be sure they 're in a sunny enough spot , and to maybe even check the ph in the soil .
i used to grow tomatoes - they 're quite easy , they 're literally a weed .
a problem is they fruit too early , and get bottom rot .
natspink asks : hi beth !
which three people ( famous or otherwise ) would you most like to invite to a dream dinner party and what would you cook ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:15pm i would make a lasagna .
i would invite roseanne barr , my best friend jerry , and someone completely ridiculous , like linda , the mom from bob 's burgers .
it would be amazing .
the game would be to guess the one who said something , because linda and roseanne sound exactly alike .
lifeisajoke asks : do you still live in london ?
what 's your favourite thing about the city ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:13pm all my friends who live here who i never get to see .
i do come here often ; i practically live here .
salviaplath asks : if you had to live as yourself but in the body of an animal for the rest of your life , what animal would it be and why ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:12pm a house cat .
it 's a sweet-ass life .
cussutduck asks : i like the tulips .
do you think the biosphere stands a chance , or have we gone too far ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:12pm thank you .
it does stand a chance - hope is everything .
anyway , are n't we going to live on mars soon ?
who cares about the biosphere !
am i right folks ?
i listened to a podcast about people for that mars mission it was like in napoleon dynamite : do you have any skills ?
yeah , i turn waste gases into oxygen i would not want to go .
fuck no .
no way .
imagine .
you 've got to be someone who 's really not got anything going on in their life on earth .
i would n't mind a trip into space with karl pilkington though .
itgetsworser asks : what sort of music are you listening to these days ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:09pm for the most part i listen to country music .
i love paul simon too .
and we listened to david bowie all day the other day .

documents.title: 'i did n't know my last name was a word until the movie ghost came out . patrick swayze is like : `` ditto '' '
text: fullaeit asks : how often do people make a joke out of your surname ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:08pm not as often as they should .
my name is actually homer ditto .
i did n't know my last name was a word until the movie ghost came out .
patrick swayze is like : ditto .
i had one teacher who called me ditto machine because i was so loud - it was like a photocopier before a photocopier , you had to crank it .
that 's how broke the school i went to was .
torjs99 asks : white or black t-shirt ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:06pm white , all the way .
it depends , if it 's a smaller tshirt , it lays better .
if it 's a band tshirt , i want it to be white ; if it 's a sports tshirt , or oversized , it 's black .
lefty-loosey , whitey-tighty .
kate halton asks : it was my partner liam 's birthday yesterday i 'd be honoured if you wished him all the best !
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:05pm happy birthday liam , for yesterday .
you have a very sweet partner .
it 's my birthday tomorrow - i hope to live another year with all this weight on my bones .
just kidding i wish my best friend could be here .
and a cake , that 's all i want .
chocolate no , victoria sponge .
ultrabert asks : do you think leicester can do it ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:03pm definitely .
i 'm a big fan of leicester .
i love the feet , the balls , the kicking , all the uniforms , and running .
and the kicking .
and the fans !

documents.title: 'still riding on that standing in the way of control hype '
text: green123 asks : will you be playing glastonbury this year ?
gossip is an incredible live band and i 'd love to see you again !
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:02pm fuuuuck no .
still riding on that standing in the way of control hype i 'm working on part two , sitting in the way of control .
my legs do n't support my weight any more .
it 's so weird that people think that about me like i 'm walking with a cane !
they should be more worried about my smoking than my weight .
timo123 asks : are you well-known in arkansas ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:01pm no .
well , considering my family takes up half of the state , then maybe .
i just made a list of the most known people in arkansas - i was in at 10 .
bill clinton was one , johnny cash at two .
ste137 asks : i 've always wanted to know what city you 're singing about in love in a foreign place ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:00pm london !
it 's not that foreign , is it .

documents.title: 'i combat [ sexism ] by not taking no for an answer '
text: wskelton asks : have you encountered prejudice in the music or fashion industry because of your sex or sexuality ?
all the best to kristin too if she 's in .
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 1:00pm sexism is dead .
not !
of course i have , but it would take too long .
we 'd be here all day .
i just do whatever i want to do , really ; i combat it by not taking no for an answer .
in boundary scenarios i take no for an answer sometimes .

documents.title: 'i 've never done auditions i can never just `` turn it on '' '
text: whatsthisallabout asks : how do you thnk you 'd get on at an x factor audition ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:57pm every time i see those shows i cringe because i do n't think i would do well .
especially all those people back there practicing backstage ; i would be fake tap dancing and taking a nap while they sang .
i 've never done auditions - i can never just `` turn it on '' .
paul hemphill asks : if you were to take up hurdling now do you think you might be ready for rio 2016 ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:55pm i 'm ready now .
i 've been doing this for years !
tintenfische asks : really really want to ask an intelligent question as i love gossip and beth but i ca n't think of a single one .
so an unintelligent and plagiarised one will have to do what 's your favourite spoon ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:55pm big spoon .
jlucas86 asks : your 2011 ep with simian mobile disco was incredible .
would you ever consider doing a full dance album ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:54pm yes .
i will consider it and also thank you !
i 'm not sure what it would sound like i 'm bad at talking about sounds at times .
ledboots asks : who won the fa cup in 1942 ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:53pm turkey .
maybe france .
mfceiling asks : i 've heard of you but never heard any of your music .
what would be your best three songs ( in your opinion ) to get someone like me interested in your sound ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:53pm someone like you ?
play someone like you , hello songs like this .

documents.title: 'ursula from the little mermaid and mama grape from what 's eating gilbert grape ? are my inspirations fashion-wise '
text: charlesokeefe asks : do dress for yourself , women , men , fashion or art or art-teasers ?
in regards to other women : 1 .
which women have/have not visually beset your persona ?
mae west , aretha franklin , mary tyler moore , grade school teacher etc ?
in regards to men : 1 .
how do feel regarding a man ( date ) your outfit for you ?
have you ever allowed a man ( date ) into your boudoir for a fashion teaser ?
is something in your heart you search for more or most ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:51pm this is like a riddle !
he hung himself sitting on an iceblock ursula from the little mermaid , and mama grape from what 's eating gilbert grape ?
are my inspirations fashion-wise .
as for the rest i dress mostly for a man date .
what does that even mean ?
a man out my outfit quite often - his name is frederic are you coming onto me ?
to the last question : yes .
orange .

daftbell asks : regarding your looks , as the music industry is truly narrow minded when it comes to female singers being considered as potential objects , did you undergo pressure of some sort or direct remarks about your curves from your label at the beginning of your career ?
ps .
you are looking stunning guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:48pm thank you !
no , never .

i ca n't imagine someone trying to say that to me in the beginning : you know , you 're really great , but have you thought about i do n't actually know where i 'd be without my body , my image as it is .
pukahontas asks : why have you priced so many of your fans out of your fashion collection ?
i 've spoken to several other girls today who are admirers of yours , and we all agree â£ 80 for plain black leggings is just ridiculous .
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:45pm it was n't intentional to do that .
the fabric it 's made of , and because it 's all made in america , it 's almost impossible to do it for any lower than that price .
if you want to do a quality ethical fashion line for plus size women , there unfortunately are n't that many choices because of the fabric and ethical production .
we 're definitely working on it next time , to make it a more reasonable price point , but it 's all a learning curve .
seven yards of silk for a jumpsuit - that 's how much it takes to cover a fat person .
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:47pm and i say that with love !
from one fat person who will die young to another .
it is ridiculous pricing , but until there are more choices we 're working with what we have .
we 're trying to be better .
binmandom asks : tea .
bags or loose leaf ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:42pm i 'm always choosing tea bags
ottomaddox asks : your image and the production on the earlier gossip albums was very raw and punky and both seemed to get slicker and more glam in the wake of the band having chart success .
was it a conscious decision to change the band 's image to go after sales ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:41pm haha !
i wish it was .
definitely not .
it was not a conscious decision .
luckily we had some success which led us to higher quality production and more choices , and we made the decision on what sound we wanted for each record .
do you ever get stage fright ?
if so , how do you manage it ?
have you any home made remedies to keep your voice in tip top shape ?
you have great self esteem , what advice would you give young women and men who are insecure about their appearance ?
will your fashion line be ethical and sweatshop free ?
what do you think of kanye 's fashion line ?
should he persevere or stick to producing music ?
6. who is your style icon/guru ?
all the best with your fashion range , cheers !
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:39pm 1 .
yes , rarely .
red bull .
becuase then you have no choice but to move around a lot.2 .
mostly smoking cigars.3 .
do n't let people openly ask you questions on the guardian jk jk jk .
i would say , do n't hang around with people who make you feel like shit , and do n't read media who make you feel like shit.4 .
it is !
it is .
i 'm very proud of that.5 .
i do n't think about kanye a lot .
not in a mean way , that 's just honest .
i do like kanye .
it was very green was n't it ?
a lot of earth tones.6 .
miss piggy and fat bastard .
youcantala asks : will there ever be a boy who could swim faster than a shark ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:36pm this is an office reference , and i get it .
i 'm so british .
hollymusic asks : have you written the follow-up hit yet ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:36pm give me another ten years !

documents.title: 'i prefer `` live fat , die never '' . i 'm pretty sure my weight decides itself '
text: doomsoloudithurts asks : given your choice to be the weight you are do you worry about your health ?
if so , at what point would you revise your lifestyle to allow for a longer life ?
or are you a fuck it kind of person who intends to live fast die young ?
i often wonder when i see people who are so far beyond the so called healthy weight , the trade off in the short term is great but the longer term consequences must be a bit frightening ?

personally i am glad you and others are out there in the public eye because i feel just as strongly about the other extreme of thinness , you seem happy and you have n't had tons of work done which is commendable .
real over fake any day .
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:35pm i prefer `` live fat , die never '' .
i 'm pretty sure my weight decides itself - it 's not like `` if i do n't eat this much cottage cheese today , i wo n't reach my limit '' .
i 'm not a wrestler !
i 'm not going on diet - but i do like me a gym .
we were supposed to have an elliptical in our house by now

joe bradbury asks : given the fact that censorship can not take away the right of free speech due to that right being immutable , and considering that the very concept of rights being limited by some external authority is abhorrent , what do you prefer on your toast marmalade or jam ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:33pm jam for sure we call it jelly for one .
marmalade is ok but it has a rind in it .
i like it , but i 'd rather have jelly .
st balfour have a delicious pineapple jelly - i recommend it .
doomsoloudithurts asks : marmite ?
devils under nail jam or devine loveliness ?
guardian contributor bethditto 18 february 2016 12:31pm no thanks .
there 's no way .

documents.title: beth is now with us !
text: here she is , with a list of your questions .
let 's kick things off !
beaumont-thomas

documents.title: post your questions for beth ditto
text: hollering like a particularly evangelical gospel singer , beth ditto has powered the band gossip across five studio albums of bluesy punk and sleek disco , with hits along the way including standing in the way of control and heavy cross .
she has now created her first fashion collection , made exclusively for plus-sized women , and launched to coincide with london fashion week .
i wanted to create something all its own , something just for us , made with love and consideration , ditto says .
made ethically in the usa as a small company with no big corporate input .
uncompromising , unapologetic , and timeless .
she is presenting the collection at selfridges on thursday 18 february , and earlier in the day will be joining us to answer your questions in a live webchat , from 12.30pm gmt .
post them in the comments below , and she 'll answer as many as possible .

bulletin.text: The Gossip singer and now fashion designer joined us to answer your questions catch up with her answers here, from her plans for a solo record with songs like Bobby McFerrin's Don't Worry Be Happy, but sad to her new venture into ethical fashion, via surname puns and how she combats sexism.
